kdr.resume.salestaxes.tax
Interface Tax

All Known Implementing Classes:
ImportTax, NickelRoundedRateTax, RateTax, RoundedRateTax, SalesTax
public interface Tax

Tax interface. All taxes must implement this interface.

Author:
Kris Read
